Supporting Docs
Die Cut Sticker Customization

2 min
overview the die cut sticker customization product in onprintshop allows customers to design and order uniquely shaped stickers tailored to their brand or personal needs unlike standard shapes, die cut stickers are precisely trimmed around the design’s outline, offering a high level of customization and professional appeal this product supports a wide range of sizes, finishes, and materials, making it ideal for marketing, packaging, or creative applications purpose the product offers businesses and individuals a flexible, self service tool to create custom shaped stickers directly through the storefront it streamlines the ordering process by allowing users to upload their artwork, select material and finish options, and get real time pricing based on dimensions and quantity for print providers, this feature simplifies production workflows while enabling upselling through customization, making it a powerful addition to any sticker product line features advantages of the die cut sticker products at onprintshop – boosts revenue through high demand, premium custom orders automates customization workflow, reducing manual effort enables real time pricing based on size and quantity centralized management of all sticker variants enhances customer experience with easy self serve tools
